response.answer_text: NECO was establish taking during the responsibilities of the National board for education measurement (NBEM) which came to be, in 1992, from the Ibrahim babangida administration, although it's enabling decre was promulagted in 1993. Right here is the examination taken by candidates into their last stage of secondary school education. the ssce is by 50 percent categories. The first is for candidates in your third and final year of these senior secondary education in addition to being called SSCE Internal as you move the Second is SSce external.
